snippet: Other No. 1 seeds for the tournament, which begins Tuesday, are Washington, Tennessee and Arizona.
abstract: Seton Hall and Washington are No. 1 seeds in the National Invitational Tournament after being left out of the men's NCAA basketball tournament; Tennessee and Arizona also receive top seeds in the NIT.
lead_paragraph: Other No. 1 seeds for the tournament, which begins Tuesday, are Washington, Tennessee and Arizona.

headline.seo: Seton Hall Among Top Seeds in N.I.T.
headline.main: Seton Hall Among Top Seeds in N.I.T.
headline.print_headline: Seton Hall Among Top Seeds in N.I.T.
